titles.title: Recognizing Robert Bosch Corporation and its 100 years of commitment and leadership in the United States manufacturing industry.
Recognizing Robert Bosch Corporation and its 100 years of commitment and leadership in the United States manufacturing industry.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commerce, Trade and Consumer Protection.

bill.summary:
Recognizes: (1) Robert Bosch Corporation's 100 years of commitment and leadership in the U.S. manufacturing industry; and (2) the innovations and technological advancements achieved by the thousands of Corporation associates.
Congratulates the Corporation on its centennial anniversary in the United States and trusts that the company will continue its excellence and position in the community during the 21st century.
